settings.content:
Shipping

All Orders are fulfilled and then shipped to anywhere in the UK in 1-3 working days on average.

All orders come with tracking information once shipped.

Returns

Not happy with your purchase? No worries, we've got you covered!

You may return it within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or exchange, no questions asked. To initiate a return, just contact our customer service team at support@thefleececompany.com.
